info.title: SqlManagementClient
info.description: The Azure SQL Database management API provides a RESTful set of web APIs that interact with Azure SQL Database services to manage your databases. The API enables users to create, retrieve, update, and delete databases, servers, and other entities.

get.description: Gets list of Azure SQL Database Advisors.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Server on which the Azure SQL Database is hosted.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of database advisors.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 InvalidIdentifier - The identifier contains NULL or an invalid unicode character.

 * 404 AdvisorNotFound - The requested advisor was not found.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

 * 404 DatabaseDoesNotExist - The requested database was not found

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveElasticPool - The requested elastic pool was not found

 * 405 NotSupported - This functionality is not supported.

 * 409 Conflict - Request could not be processed because of conflict in the request.

 * 503 ServiceTemporarilyUnavailable - Feature temporarily unavailable.

get.description: Returns details of an Azure SQL Database Advisor.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Server on which the Azure SQL Database is hosted.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database.

parameters.name: advisorName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Advisor.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation

200.description: Successfully retrieved details of specified database advisor.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 InvalidIdentifier - The identifier contains NULL or an invalid unicode character.

 * 404 AdvisorNotFound - The requested advisor was not found.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

 * 404 DatabaseDoesNotExist - The requested database was not found

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveElasticPool - The requested elastic pool was not found

 * 405 NotSupported - This functionality is not supported.

 * 409 Conflict - Request could not be processed because of conflict in the request.

 * 503 ServiceTemporarilyUnavailable - Feature temporarily unavailable.

patch.description: Updates an Azure SQL Database Advisor.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Server on which the Azure SQL Database is hosted.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database.

parameters.name: advisorName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Advisor.

parameters.name: advisor
parameters.description: The requested advisor resource state.

200.description: Successfully updated the specified database advisor.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 InvalidIdentifier - The identifier contains NULL or an invalid unicode character.

 * 400 InvalidAdvisorUpsertRequest - The update advisor request body does not exist or has no properties object.

 * 400 InvalidAdvisorAutoExecuteStatus - Specified auto-execute status for the advisor is not allowed.

 * 404 AdvisorNotFound - The requested advisor was not found.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

 * 404 DatabaseDoesNotExist - The requested database was not found

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveElasticPool - The requested elastic pool was not found

 * 405 NotSupported - This functionality is not supported.

 * 409 Conflict - Request could not be processed because of conflict in the request.

 * 503 ServiceTemporarilyUnavailable - Feature temporarily unavailable.

get.description: Gets list of Azure SQL Database Recommended Actions.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Server on which the Azure SQL Database is hosted.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database.

parameters.name: advisorName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Advisor.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of database recommended actions.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 InvalidIdentifier - The identifier contains NULL or an invalid unicode character.

 * 404 AdvisorNotFound - The requested advisor was not found.

 * 404 RecommendedActionNotFound - The requested recommended action was not found.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

 * 404 DatabaseDoesNotExist - The requested database was not found

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveElasticPool - The requested elastic pool was not found

 * 405 NotSupported - This functionality is not supported.

 * 409 Conflict - Request could not be processed because of conflict in the request.

 * 503 ServiceTemporarilyUnavailable - Feature temporarily unavailable.

get.description: Returns details of an Azure SQL Database Recommended Action.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Server on which the Azure SQL Database is hosted.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database.

parameters.name: advisorName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Advisor.

parameters.name: recommendedActionName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Recommended Action.

200.description: Successfully retrieved details of specified database recommended action.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 InvalidIdentifier - The identifier contains NULL or an invalid unicode character.

 * 404 AdvisorNotFound - The requested advisor was not found.

 * 404 RecommendedActionNotFound - The requested recommended action was not found.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

 * 404 DatabaseDoesNotExist - The requested database was not found

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveElasticPool - The requested elastic pool was not found

 * 405 NotSupported - This functionality is not supported.

 * 409 Conflict - Request could not be processed because of conflict in the request.

 * 503 ServiceTemporarilyUnavailable - Feature temporarily unavailable.

patch.description: Updates an Azure SQL Database Recommended Action.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Server on which the Azure SQL Database is hosted.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database.

parameters.name: advisorName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Advisor.

parameters.name: recommendedActionName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Recommended Action.

parameters.name: recommendedAction
parameters.description: The requested recommended action resource state.

200.description: Successfully updated the specified database recommended action.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 InvalidIdentifier - The identifier contains NULL or an invalid unicode character.

 * 400 InvalidRecommendedActionUpsertRequest - The update recommended action request body does not exist or has no properties or state object.

 * 400 InvalidRecommendedActionState - The specified state for recommended action is invalid

 * 404 AdvisorNotFound - The requested advisor was not found.

 * 404 RecommendedActionNotFound - The requested recommended action was not found.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

 * 404 DatabaseDoesNotExist - The requested database was not found

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveElasticPool - The requested elastic pool was not found

 * 405 NotSupported - This functionality is not supported.

 * 409 Conflict - Request could not be processed because of conflict in the request.

 * 503 ServiceTemporarilyUnavailable - Feature temporarily unavailable.

get.description: Get a list of database engine audit records.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Server on which the Azure SQL Database is hosted.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database for which database engine audit records are retrieved.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of engine audit records.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 InvalidEngineAuditRecordsQueryParameters - Invalid query parameters

 * 400 InvalidEngineAuditRecordsShowSystemRecordsFilter - The ShowSystemRecords property only supports the equal (eq) operation

 * 400 InvalidEngineAuditRecordsEndTimeFilter - The EventTime property currently supports only the less than or equal (le) operation, designating the End Time.

 * 400 InvalidEngineAuditRecordsShowServerRecordsFilter - The ShowServerRecords property only supports the equal (eq) operation

 * 400 InvalidEngineAuditRecordsShowSecurityAlertsRecordsFilter - The ShowSecurityAlerts property only supports the equal (eq) operation

 * 404 SourceDatabaseNotFound - The source database does not exist.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

 * 405 DatabaseEngineAuditRecordsNotImplemented - Operations on database audit records are not enabled yet

 * 500 GetEngineAuditRecordsFailed - Failed to get audit records

get.description: Gets list of Azure SQL Database Elastic Pool Advisors.

get.description: Returns information about Azure SQL job accounts.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Server that the job accounts are hosted in.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of job accounts.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

get.description: Returns information about an Azure SQL job account.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Server that the job account is hosted in.

parameters.name: jobAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL job account to be retrieved.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the specified job account.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

 * 404 JobAccountNotFound - Specified elastic job account does not exist in the specified logical server.

put.description: Creating a new Azure SQL job account or updating an existing Azure SQL job account.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Server that the job account is hosted in.

parameters.name: jobAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL job account to be created or updated.

parameters.name: jobAccountResource
parameters.description: The requested job account resource state.

200.description: Successfully updated the job account.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 InvalidJobAccountCreateOrUpdateRequest - The create or update job account request body is empty or invalid.

 * 400 InvalidDatabaseResourceId - Invalid database resource identifier.

 * 400 MismatchingSubscriptionWithUrl - The provided subscription did not match the subscription in the Url.

 * 400 MismatchingResourceGroupNameWithUrl - The provided resource group name did not match the name in the Url.

 * 400 MismatchingServerNameWithUrl - The provided server name did not match the name in the Url.

 * 400 DatabaseDoesNotExist - The requested database was not found

 * 400 JobAccountExceededAccountsQuota - Could not create job account because it would exceed the quota.

 * 400 JobAccountAlreadyExists - The job account already exists on the server.

 * 400 JobAccountDatabaseEditionUnsupported - The specified database's service level objective is not supported for use as a job account database.

 * 400 CannotUseReservedDatabaseName - Cannot use reserved database name in this operation.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

 * 404 SubscriptionNotFound - The requested subscription was not found.

delete.description: Deletes the Azure SQL job account with the given name.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Server that the job account is hosted in.

parameters.name: jobAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL job account to be deleted.

200.description: Successfully deleted the job account.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

 * 404 JobAccountNotFound - Specified elastic job account does not exist in the specified logical server.

204.description: The specified job account does not exist.

get.description: Returns a list of Elastic jobs credentials.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Server that the job accounts are hosted in.

parameters.name: jobAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the job account.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of job credentials.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 404 JobAccountNotFound - Specified elastic job account does not exist in the specified logical server.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

get.description: Returns information about an Elastic jobs credential.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Server that the job accounts are hosted in.

parameters.name: jobAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the job account.

parameters.name: credentialName
parameters.description: The name of the credential.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the job credential.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 404 JobAccountNotFound - Specified elastic job account does not exist in the specified logical server.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

 * 404 ResourceNotFound - The requested resource was not found.

put.description: Creates or updates an Elastic jobs credential.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Server that the job accounts are hosted in.

parameters.name: jobAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the job account.

parameters.name: credentialName
parameters.description: The name of the credential.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: The requested job credential state.

200.description: Successfully updated the credential.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 404 JobAccountNotFound - Specified elastic job account does not exist in the specified logical server.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

delete.description: Deletes the Elastic job credential with the given name.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Server that the job accounts are hosted in.

parameters.name: jobAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the job account.

parameters.name: credentialName
parameters.description: The name of the credential.

200.description: Successfully deleted the credential.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 404 JobAccountNotFound - Specified elastic job account does not exist in the specified logical server.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

 * 404 ResourceNotFound - The requested resource was not found.

204.description: A credential with the specified name does not exist.

get.description: Returns a list of the steps under an Elastic job.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Server that the job accounts are hosted in.

parameters.name: jobAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the job account.

parameters.name: jobName
parameters.description: The name of the job step to get.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of job steps.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 404 JobAccountNotFound - Specified elastic job account does not exist in the specified logical server.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

post.description: Adds a step to an existing Elastic job.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Server that the job accounts are hosted in.

parameters.name: jobAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the job account.

parameters.name: jobName
parameters.description: The name of the job step to get.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: The requested state of the job step.

200.description: OK

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 404 JobAccountNotFound - Specified elastic job account does not exist in the specified logical server.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

get.description: Returns information about Elastic job steps.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Server that the job accounts are hosted in.

parameters.name: jobAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the job account.

parameters.name: jobName
parameters.description: The name of the job step to get.

parameters.name: jobStepId
parameters.description: The id of the job step.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the job step.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 404 JobAccountNotFound - Specified elastic job account does not exist in the specified logical server.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

 * 404 ResourceNotFound - The requested resource was not found.

put.description: Creates a new step under an Elastic job or updates an existing step.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Server that the job accounts are hosted in.

parameters.name: jobAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the job account.

parameters.name: jobName
parameters.description: The name of the job step to get.

parameters.name: jobStepId
parameters.description: The id of the job step.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: The requested state of the job step.

200.description: Successfully updated the job step.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 JobStepIdMismatch - Step Id in the specified Job Step URI does not match step id in provided Job Step Resource.

 * 404 JobAccountNotFound - Specified elastic job account does not exist in the specified logical server.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

delete.description: Deletes the Elastic job step with the given name.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Server that the job accounts are hosted in.

parameters.name: jobAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the job account.

parameters.name: jobName
parameters.description: The name of the job step to get.

parameters.name: jobStepId
parameters.description: The id of the job step.

200.description: Successfully deleted the job step.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 404 JobAccountNotFound - Specified elastic job account does not exist in the specified logical server.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

204.description: The specified job step does not exist.

parameters.name: recommendedActionName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Server Recommended Action.

200.description: Successfully retrieved details of specified server recommended action.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 InvalidIdentifier - The identifier contains NULL or an invalid unicode character.

 * 404 AdvisorNotFound - The requested advisor was not found.

 * 404 RecommendedActionNotFound - The requested recommended action was not found.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

 * 404 DatabaseDoesNotExist - The requested database was not found

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveElasticPool - The requested elastic pool was not found

 * 405 NotSupported - This functionality is not supported.

 * 409 Conflict - Request could not be processed because of conflict in the request.

 * 503 ServiceTemporarilyUnavailable - Feature temporarily unavailable.

patch.description: Updates an Azure SQL Database Server Recommended Action.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Server.

parameters.name: advisorName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Server Advisor.

parameters.name: recommendedActionName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Server Recommended Action.

parameters.name: recommendedAction
parameters.description: The requested recommended action resource state.

200.description: Successfully updated the specified server recommended action.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 InvalidIdentifier - The identifier contains NULL or an invalid unicode character.

 * 400 InvalidRecommendedActionUpsertRequest - The update recommended action request body does not exist or has no properties or state object.

 * 400 InvalidRecommendedActionState - The specified state for recommended action is invalid

 * 404 AdvisorNotFound - The requested advisor was not found.

 * 404 RecommendedActionNotFound - The requested recommended action was not found.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

 * 404 DatabaseDoesNotExist - The requested database was not found

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveElasticPool - The requested elastic pool was not found

 * 405 NotSupported - This functionality is not supported.

 * 409 Conflict - Request could not be processed because of conflict in the request.

 * 503 ServiceTemporarilyUnavailable - Feature temporarily unavailable.

get.description: Returns a list of Elastic jobs target groups.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Server that the job accounts are hosted in.

parameters.name: jobAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the job account.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of target groups.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 404 JobAccountNotFound - Specified elastic job account does not exist in the specified logical server.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

get.description: Returns a Elastic jobs target group.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Server that the job accounts are hosted in.

parameters.name: jobAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the job account.

parameters.name: targetGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the target group.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the target group.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 404 JobAccountNotFound - Specified elastic job account does not exist in the specified logical server.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

 * 404 ResourceNotFound - The requested resource was not found.

put.description: Creates or updates an Elastic jobs target group.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Server that the job accounts are hosted in.

parameters.name: jobAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the job account.

parameters.name: targetGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the target group.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: The requested state of the target group.

200.description: Successfully updated the target group.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 404 JobAccountNotFound - Specified elastic job account does not exist in the specified logical server.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

delete.description: Deletes the Elastic job target group with the given name.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database Server that the job accounts are hosted in.

parameters.name: jobAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the job account.

parameters.name: targetGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the target group.

200.description: Successfully deleted the target group.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 404 JobAccountNotFound - Specified elastic job account does not exist in the specified logical server.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

 * 404 ResourceNotFound - The requested resource was not found.

204.description: A target group with the specified name does not exist.

error.description: Contains the information about the error.

ArmErrorResponseExtendedErrorInfo.description: Contains additional information about the error that occured.

target.description: The target of the particular error.

ArmErrorResponseErrorDetail.description: Details about the error that occurred

ResourceMoveDefinition.description: Contains the information necessary to perform a resource move (rename).

id.description: The target ID for the resource

JobAccountResource.description: Contains information about an Azure SQL Database Elastic job account.

JobAccountResourceProperties.description: Properties for an Azure SQL Database Elastic job account.

databaseId.description: ARM id of the job account control database.
